div.p: Be Valued. Be Inspired. Be Resourceful. Be Together!

strong.span: Please click on the COVID-19 Updates for new information!

span.strong: CEE SURVEY - YOU ARE INVITED TO COMPLETE THE SURVEY ONCE PER WEEK

br.span: Be a part of our collective conversation! We ask that you please share your perceptions about student learning while schools are closed. Your perceptions and sense of hope will provide feedback to inform conversations and support improvement efforts. The Center for Educational Effectiveness will collect data and share it with our school district and the community on an ongoing basis. Thank you for participating weekly! New surveys start every Thursday - click here to take the survey.

span.br: If your child will be age five by August 31, 2020, you will need to fill out registration paperwork for the elementary school they will be attending in the fall. Please call your school and leave a detailed message with your contact information.

br.br: We are offering breakfast and lunch pick up from 11:00AM-12:30PM, Monday through Friday at Grantham Elementary and Clarkston High School. If you cannot pick up meals during this time frame and are in need of breakfast and lunch for your kids, please call 509-769-6346 and we will work with you to figure out a plan for pick up.

img.title: arrows

a.title: Regulation of Dangerous Weapons on School Premises

img.a: Regulation of Dangerous Weapons on School Premises
img.div: It is a violation of district policy and state law for any person to carry a firearm or dangerous weapon on school premises, school-provided transportation or areas of other facilities being used exclusively for school activities unless specifically authorized by state law.
img.a: Read More about Regulation of Dangerous Weapons on School Premises

img.title: arrows
img.div: Demographic information, test scores, and more for the Clarkston School District can be found on the Office of Superintendent of Public Instruction's website...

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled CSD Enrollment Requirements

img.title: arrows
img.div: Clarkston School District is changing their enrollment practices to require all students to have proof of a physical address within the Clarkston School District.
img.a: Read More about CSD Enrollment Requirements
